title: Middle East Crisis: Live Updates: Middle East on Edge as Hamas Leader is Mourned in Qatar
content: The funeral for Ismail Haniyeh, the political leader of Hamas who was assassinated earlier this week, was in Qatar. President Biden expressed deep concern about the situation in the region, and called on Israel to agree to a cease-fire in Gaza.
summary: The funeral for Ismail Haniyeh, the political leader of Hamas who was assassinated earlier this week, was in Qatar. President Biden expressed deep concern about the situation in the region, and called on Israel to agree to a cease-fire in Gaza.

title: Israel Confirms Death of Muhammad Deif, Who It Says Helped Planned Hamas Attack
content: The Israeli military said it had killed Muhammad Deif, who it called a planner of the Oct. 7 attack on Israel, which would make him the third Iranian-backed militant leader slain in recent days.
summary: The Israeli military said it had killed Muhammad Deif, who it called a planner of the Oct. 7 attack on Israel, which would make him the third Iranian-backed militant leader slain in recent days.

title: Russian Dissident Says He Was Traded Against His Will in Inmate Swap
